job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's or Master's in Computer Science, Engineering, or related fields

primary: Azure Tech (AKS, Function Apps, KQL, ADF)
all: Azure Tech (AKS, Function Apps, KQL, ADF)

jd: From: Rajesh, Incorporan Inc rajeshkumar@incorporaninc.com Reply to: rajeshkumar@incorporaninc.com INCORPORAN INC is looking for Azure Cloud Developer with experience in Angular, C#, HTML, SQL, PowerApps for our client in the location is Phoenix, AZ (Onsite from day 1)Title: Azure Cloud Developer with experience in Angular, C#, HTML, SQL, PowerAppsLocation: Phoenix, AZ (Onsite from day 1)Duration: Long term ProjectPASSPORT NUMBER AND LINKEDIN ARE MANDATORY Interviews are happening within 24 hours, need to be available Skype and video call is must, please available on requested Time slotJob Summary:Cloud Computing and Azure API Services Proficiency: A deep understanding of cloud computing concepts is crucial. You should be proficient in Azure services, including: Azure Computing, Angular, C#, HTML, SQL, PowerApps, API ; Azure Tech (AKS, Function Apps, KQL, ADF).Data Modeling and Database Management: a. Designing effective data models is essential. You'll work with both SQL and NoSQL databases. b. Ensure data is structured and stored optimally for efficient querying and analysis.ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) Processes: a. Proficiency in ETL techniques is vital for data integration and processing. b. Extract, transform, and load data efficiently to support analytics and reporting.Programming Languages: a. Familiarity with programming languages such as C# , Python, Scala, and .NET is valuable. b. Python, in particular, is widely used for data manipulation and analytics.Data Warehousing and Data Lakes: Understand data warehousing concepts and data lakes. These are fundamental for managing large-scale data.Problem-Solving and Collaboration: Soft skills matter too! Effective problem-solving and teamwork enhance your ability to drive data-driven decisions. Proficiency in designing, implementing, and managing data solutions on the Azure cloud platform.Experience: Overall 5- 7+ years of Data warehousing experience, including:- Minimum of 5 years of experience in Azure Computing, Angular, C#, HTML, SQL, PowerApps, API.Education: Relevant degree (Bachelor's or Master's) in Computer Science, Engineering, or related fields. Certifications: Consider certifications related to Azure (e.g., Azure Data Engineer, Azure Solutions Architect). Please send me your resumes and contact details at rajeshkumar@incorporaninc.com or call Rajesh at 609-474-4722
